document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">Stagnant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">pleasure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8044f0">Pool </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">lets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Rushes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">grow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Until </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#18ff86">heedless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">tumble </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">make </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">Water </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">slow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Impeding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">navigation </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">bright </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">Shadows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">going </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">even </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">shall </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">rouse </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#48ff56">Freshets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">along </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A stagnant pleasure like a pool
